casebody.data:
MALCOLM, Respondent, v. NEW YORK EL. RY. CO. et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by James F. Malcolm against the New York Elevated Railway Company and others.

Argued before O’BRIEN, FOLLETT, and PARKER, JJ.

G. T. Aldrich, for appellants. E. W. Tyler, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
